File Reader

File Reading for Copcon.

This module provides functionality to read the contents of files in the project directory, handling both text and binary files appropriately.

class copcon.core.file_reader.FileContentReader(base_directory, file_filter, exclude_hidden)

Bases: object

Reads and manages the contents of files in the project directory.

Handles reading text files and providing placeholders for binary files. Keeps track of the total number of characters processed.

read_all()

Read all applicable files in the base directory.

Returns:

A dictionary mapping relative file paths to their contents.

Return type:

Dict[str, str]

Raises:

FileReadError – If any file read operations fail.
